pullRequest.title: Fix(pagination): Fix paging APIs - Regenerate from swagger.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Autorest has a new version with updates to the listing API implementation to fix the pagination issue where

next link is not fully qualified
request headers were missing.

I also tested the generated code with fully qualified next links and it works perfectly.

commit.message: Fix(pagination): Fix paging APIs - Regenerate from swagger.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -2,6 +2,7 @@
 
 ## 1.0.0-beta.3 (Unreleased)
 
+- Fixed issue with pagination APIs that support max-ite-count where the item count was not respected from the second page forward.

nodes.bodyText: This is interesting. It looks like this new autorest version lets us set the service API version instead of hardcoding it to the version in the swagger we generated it from. This will come in handy for later
